mapper.select: SELECT d.donation_id, d.title, d.content, m.nickname, d.inserted, d.expired, d.goal, d.current_amount, d.enable FROM Donation d LEFT JOIN Member m ON d.member_id = m.member_id GROUP BY d.donation_id ORDER BY donation_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Donation(title, content, member_id, donation_tag_id, expired, goal) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{member_id}, #{donation_tag_id}, #{expired}, #{goal})
